title: Refund season rewards?
body:
Is there a way to refund season rewards?

I was "rewarded" with Kayle. I hate Kayle. I play a fair bit of aram & I keep getting stuck with her.  I keep having to use my re rolls. Not fun.
I have carefully curated my champion pool so that I am more likely to get champs I like to play.
I have 3 refunds remaining, but I just cant figure out how to get rid of her.

replies.body: As Minarde mentioned, we can look into your specific case about removing content.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and we'll see.  It'll be likely that we won't be able to add it back if we do get it removed.  We'll reply back asap!
Submit a ticket. Support can remove Kayle from your account.
